content.detailedDescription: I was outsrightide having a cigarette and noticed a brighwwt object coming from the nw heading se i watched it as it moved slowy across the sky at about 1o to 15000 feet whenit got to the sw portion of the sky all of a sudden there was a bright circular light which was huge around the main light then a small object shot out of the  bright light and shot upward and dissapered then the large object disapered in about two seconds
content.summary: Bright white circular disk

content.detailedDescription:
My father-in-law and i were headed north on 169, coming from crystal, mn. going to andover, mn. right as we crossed the bridge over the mississippi river in anoka, my father-in-law looked out the right passenger side window and noticed what he thought were a few helicopters.  i looked over but had to be careful because i was driving, there were three amber lights hovering in a triangular formation.  as we looked closer, we noticed this triangle slowly rotating and ascending slightly.  the longer we watched, the more we realized these weren't helicopters so we decided to pull off into a side road to get a closer look.  as we got out of the car, the bottom two lights descended behind a building, that's when i took out my iphone and took a picture (see attached).  it's not a very impressive photo but it may give things a little context.  a couple minutes later, the visible light began ascending, flickering and then slowly faded until it was gone.

i've been wondering if they were flares but flares don't maintain a triangular formation, and hover and ascend.  it was extremely surreal when we were looking at these lights, it all happened so quickly.  only after the fact, the reality began to set in.  i honestly can think of any natural or man-made explanation for what we saw.  i'm open to any honest attempts to try and explain what these were.
content.summary: Three amber color lights in a triangular formation hovering over the mississippi river in anoka, mn

content.detailedDescription:
I saw them approaching from the north and called my son out to watcn them.  we watched them for about a minute.  they were much brighter than a star, more like the front lights of an airliner taking off, and one was following the other - about a hand span at arms length.  as they passed over us to the west the lights stayed bright, so they were not 'headlights', but glowing objects.  as they traveled southward towards the moon they started going up and disappeared in about 5 seconds.

there was no sound, and it's nothing but quiet here, and you can hear if it is an aircraft passing overhead.  just silence.  their speed seemed to vary a little, almost like the effect of a large cord between them springing back and forth a bit, and was about two to three times the usual speed of a jet.
content.summary: Two bright lights traveling together, then disappeared

content.detailedDescription: Was outside to see leonid meteor shower with wife and friend when wife said look what i see. and what we saw was a trianguler shaped object with light on each corner moving north to south very fast and quiet too. later perhaps 30-45 min we saw it again moving north to south more west of us.
content.summary: North to south, later again

content.detailedDescription: Sometime shortly after 7:00pm cdt 25nov09 i witnessed 4-6 brilliant pinkish-red objects moving rapidly from east to west about 25 degrees above the southern horizon.  i observed the phenomenon from my home while burning trash outdoors.  my location was (is) approximately seven miles nw of ada, oklahoma in a rural setting.  the weather was clear, sky fairly dark (about 1 1/2 hours after local sunset), and practically no wind (smoke from the trash fire rising straight into the sky).  i at first believed i was seeing fireworks, particularly because of the color (definitely the pinkish-red observed with strontium salt pyrotechnics) and the rapidity of motion.  the duration was very brief, 2-3 seconds at the most, and i did witness the event in its entirity.  i listened for a report, but heard none; and i did not see smoke or a cinder/ash cloud as would be expected from pyrotechnics.  these objects did not increase or decrease in brightness; they simply appeared while in motion and then disappeared very shortly thereafter.  the motion of the objects was also trending slightly upward as they moved from east to west.  the appearance was so brief that i was unable to accurately count the number of objects, hence the 4-6 estimate.  there is a significant treeline about 1/4 mile due south of my property that obscures the first 10-15 degrees of the horizon, and the objects were an apparent 8-10 degrees above it.  i must assume from that observation alone that the objects were at least one mile to my south, but they could have been much further.  i simply could not judge the distance in such a short time, and as a consequence, i had no real reference on which to estimate their velocity.  they were moving quickly, (shooting would be a good description of their motion), and there was no change in velocity or direction for the duration of the display.  i can state with certainty, that the objects were not aircraft, astronomical bodies, aurorae, commercial lighting, wildlife, or combustible gas from decaying organic matter.  i don't believe the light was reflected at all; it seemed to be generated by the objects.  the brilliance of the light was notable, very bright like fireworks or emergency flares.  the lack of sound was also notable, it was a very quiet and still evening, and i heard nothing except for the fire burning in the barrel i was tending.  and i must state that the aforementioned fire was well to one side (15-20 feet) and out of the line of sight to these objects.  i informed my wife of my observation immediately after it occured, but she did not witness anything herself.  i also told my oldest daughter almost a day later at thanksgiving dinner, and she was clearly skeptical and more or less dismissed the whole thing as some kind of silliness on my part.  that skepticism alone convinced me to report the phenomenon to this site.  i have been actively observing aerial phenomena for over 43 years, and i am familiar with both astronomical and terrestrial objects that are commonly mistaken for ufos (and i hesitate to even use the term ufo for all the negative connotation associated with it).  i cannot explain what i saw to my own satisfaction, therefore i submit the observation here for consideration by others more experienced in the field.  i'm curious to know if anyone else has experienced a similar sighting, and of course, if it has been explained to their satisfaction.
content.summary: 4-6 brilliant red objects moving rapidly e-w 20-25deg above s horizon

content.detailedDescription:
After observing the shuttle/station flyover, 4 other witnesses and i saw a silver round or sphere like object moving quickly across the sky, stopping suddenly, then zipping back the other way. at times it would move in a zig-zag pattern. all people who saw it commented on it. i will have my girlfriend file a report as well. 
i noticed the object, as did one other as it zipped into view, about 2 mins after the shuttle/space station had passed.
the object finally flew out of view, towards the west.........
was excited after seeing the object. and was wishing i had had a video camera with me !!!!!!
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: Silver object, possible lit in silver,

content.detailedDescription:
I was fishing at night when i saw 4 lights low in the sky. from right to left there were 2 bright white round lights then an reddish orange light and then another white light. my first impression was the 2 white lights were square and radiating out making them look round and appeared to be on the backside of something. the reddish orange light had straight sides and round at the bottom and was going on and off. the other white light also had straight sides and a round bottom. it also came on and off and was very bright. the lights moved slowly from right to left in front of me and appeared to be moving away from me. there was no sound that i could hear till it got directly in front of me. it was a very deep hum. once it was a little past my center line i couldn't hear the hum anymore. also the white light the was going on and off, reflected off the water. the light must have been very bright because the edges of the reflection were straight in the water.
 as the lights moved across in front of me all 4 lights now appeared to be in a straight line. also i didn't see what the lights were attached to. as the the lights moved away from me i went back to fishing. 
 all i can say is if the 2 round white lights were landing lights, then it was flying backwards.
content.summary: 2 white lights, 1 reddish orange light, 1 different white light.

content.detailedDescription: I was taking kids  home   pastor  was  driving   i was looking  out  the  windsheild  &  saw  a strange  light in sky  theh  i saw a  triangle  with three  big  lights  in  back.....  darryn  r. smith
content.summary: I  was  in a  church  van  taking  childern  home

content.detailedDescription: I was taking kids  home   pastor  was  driving   i was looking  out  the  windsheild  &  saw  a strange  light in sky  theh  i saw a  triangle  with three  big  lights  in  back.....  darryn  r. smith
content.summary: I  was  in a  church  van  taking  childern  home

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i were walking our dog on the 100 block of price street in west chester when we noticed something overhead in the dark sky glowing red with no blinking of lights and not making a sound. we asked each other, what's that, and then another one quickly followed then another and another and another until there were 10 in formation. they floated over head and up into a dark sky up ahead behind clouds that were illuminated by the moon. after that we were in awe, wondering what we just saw with our eyes glued to sky in amazement.  we finally started moving up the block on our walk when coming from the same direction, another one floated towards us and then another and then two more which seemed to be more propelled and moving faster. we were oohing and ahhing and feeling like we should knock on someone's door to come out and see this.  but it happened so fast and we were unable to take our eyes off them until they veered upwards towards the clouds and the moon and disappeared out of site.  again we just stood there trying to imagine if these were hot air balloons, sattelites, gps, google earth cameras or what.  we started moving down the block when our dog saw one of his friends who was on his porch with his humans who were saying good bye to each other after a thanksgiving dinner together.  we told the group about what we just saw and lo and behold to validate the story, over the top of her house, another one floated overhead.  all of them were the same.  silent, red lights, surrounded by a lighter white ring not further than 1500-3000 feet, no sound, no blinking like aircraft. we thought maybe they were balloons but why would anyone fly balloons at night and that many of them all lit up. i work in the aerospace industry. it was not an aircraft. it could have been a balloon but why at night, why glowing red, why a couple of them seemed to travel faster than the others like it was propelled by something.
content.summary: 12 to 14 objects with red lights making no sound traveled east to west.

content.detailedDescription: Could not tell it was dark but they same to be coonected if so it was huge.......... sure is funny seen going north to east at 7.30 when someone else in alabama seen it 2 hours before me.. soory did not post last night deer season good job on video wished i would have pulled out my cell phone
content.summary: I saw same thing two star like lights, everyonr else is saw over hickory hollow mall told co workers what i had just seen then pulled up mufon last night and saw i wasnt the only one the videos are exacly what i seen the rear light dissapeared then front

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving sw washington street in peoria, il. i saw it while i was slowly driving 800m from mc arthur highway till i reach state street.

first, i found a plane looking thing flying above in front of me through my car window. i started thinking weird and looked at it again because it had different looking from the plane, had round two lights in front and back of its underneath.
i kept on driving, slowed down and looked at it again and found out that it did not have wings and it was flat like a disc!!
i could ot believe that i am looking at a ufo and i kept on driving and looking at it.
it was flying slowly from my left to right.
i thought it was gone but it stopped there and stayed above my front right sky for a while!
i wanted to take a photo but i couldn't beause i was driving.
it seemed like totally free from gravity.
i found some spot to park and then it moved quickly zigzag, and then flew to my left front sky, and it disappeared.
after that, 3minutes later a helicopter came, made a loud noise even it was higher than that ufo.
ufo did not make any sound at all.

it was oval, tatolly flat. black bottom with two yellow lights with some red line, one in front and one at back but i cannot tell which is front because it moved any ways.
content.summary: Oval disc with two round lights under shown above quite close and long time.

content.detailedDescription: I lived about three miles from the mountains on the western side of fort collins. i was sitting outside facing south, toward loveland when i noticed a bright light in the sky. i thought at first a plane of course, but then i noticed three helicopters rising up toward this light, it stayed a few minutes then shot upward.  i even got my husband and son to come out and look at it as none of us had ever seen something like this.
content.summary: I saw a bright oval shape in the sky.

content.detailedDescription:
On thanksgiving night a little after 6 p.M,i took the garbarge out and noticed how clear the sky was, a half-moon and a few stars.  going back to the house i looked straight up and noticed two stars, or what i thought were stars.  but as i watched more closely it was obvious they were moving to the southeast. 

i went in the house and told my wife to go see the lights while i grabbed the video camera.  i would guess their altitude to be about 2000 to 5000 ft., although there was nothing to compare the lights with to judge a more correct distance.  

there was quite a lot of distance between both objects.  the lead light was much brighter than the one following. since it was dark we couldn't tell if there was anything connecting them. the lights were a solid white & not blinking.  the sighting lasted about two minutes.  

since this sighting i've looked at other mufon reports and found several reporting the same type thing, only a day earlier and traveling in different directions.   

the video isn't good enough (too shaky) to put online but very similar to descriptions given in mufon reports 20718, 20719 and 20720.
content.summary: Two star-like lights moving together from n. w. to s. e.

content.detailedDescription: This is not a joke. my girlfriend was driving us to the movies lastnight on november 25 2009. we were west bound on 4000 a few miles or so from route 50 in bradly,il. we were on our way to see the fourth kind and thats why i said this aint a joke. any way as we travled down 4000 directed west she pointed out to me in the north west sky what appeared to be fire. the blaze appeared to be out of control burning high into the sky for the distance we saw it from. a tree line momentarly obstructed our view but then we saw it again and as we drew closer the flames only appeared to be lights verticle lights with a strange redish orange glow inside them that also illuminated around them. at this point we were just talking how we no longer see a fire just this stack of lights and we only travled a few miles from our first view and it was directly north of us at this point. there were lights on the ground but i thought it was a small subdividion or something. i could night specifically describe any real structures to you because it was very dark and cloudy last night. well at this point we were pulling into the movie theater lot. we just decided to see the movie still wondering what we just saw. when we left the movie we noticed there really isn't any houses in that field or tall building with lights or anything at all. there is a wal-mart and other stores to the left but we were not looking in the that direction. i went by there again today in the light and the field is a gulf course and then farm no houses or barns for miles nothing that could have made flames that high if they were flames but by judging the color of that stack of lights that was verticle maybe in a distance could have appeared to be fire in the sky? me and my girlfriend were in the car again today and agree there is nothing in that area that could explain what we saw. i asked her if she saw the movie fire in the sky because i did not see it yet! i said did anything appear as fire in that movie and she told me only at a distance because of the color of the lights on the ufo in that movie but you wouldn't be able to convince me or her we didin't see a sighting.
content.summary: Looked like fire in the sky

content.detailedDescription: Hey my names oscar. about a week ago whenever that meteor shower was going on, me and my friend were laying down on a soccer field looking at the sky trying to see the meteors and all that. then we saw a weird square looking thing. the weird thing about it was that i dont remember any lights on it (but my friend claims that it had a orange light) but i could still clearly see it. it was flying in a choppy zig zag path. really weird... it did like 3 zig zags with a pause in between each one, and then shot off extremely fast. just vanished. the crazy thing was the next morning in my biology lab i overheard a girl a couple tables down talking about seeing a weird thing flying in the sky, i immediately jumped in and said i saw it too. weirdest thing i have ever seen. have you heard any other stories like this?
content.summary: Black zig zag fast choppy

content.detailedDescription:
I was approximately 1/4 north of the george washington bridge taking photos, when i noticed a very bright white light followed by another very bright light moving from west to east. they flew directly overhead, and were flying at about 2,000 feet, and moving very slowly, and made absolutely no sound. there were other people present who i do not know who noticed these 2 objects as well. one person even yelled "check those 2 lights out". at which point just about everyone looked up. we all watched the 2 objects for about 2 minutes until they disappeared. there were small aircraft flying along the hudson river that must have noticed them, as well as a helicopter. 
this is an identical sighting i had and reported on 9/9/09, while walking my dog.
content.summary: Very bright white light followed by another very bright white light

content.detailedDescription:
i was heading south on hiway 400 from woodbridge to toronto for a hockey game in the city of etobickoe.Along the highway before the finch exit cars had pulled off the hiway along the shoulder.People were out of their cars and pointing to the horizon westward. intrigued i looked to see what people were staring at.

looking westward toward the horizon i saw the flickering candle flames.(what i call it)it was so beautiful.So i also pulled off the hiway.I got out of my car and just enjoyed being mesmerized by the sight.

 7 candle like flames perfectly equidistant from each other at staggered altitudes. they looked like aircraft lined for final approach for landing. as a commercial pilot i know they were not airliners. although they were north of pearson international airport.

 i stayed for ten minutes and asked some people wittnessing the sighting what they thought.No one answered me.It was so stunning.The candles in the sky stayed frozen at their altitudes stationary without any movemement.They simply flickered.Dancing on the spot if you will.

i was late for my hockey game so i decided to rush off to my car.(i feel so dumb now for lacking perspective,i should have stayed longer).

 as i looked down to find my keys to start my car i heard a big gasp from the crowd along the hiway shoulder. i looked west and the candles were gone. but i then looked up above me and saw perfectly cylindrical clouds. they were uniformed and lined up side by side.It was as if huge pipelines had been laid side by side in the sky.I didnt see the cloud formation being created.Just the completion of it.

 it to this day it was the most stunning and beautiful thing i have ever witnessed.No fear. just beauty and wonder at what i had been lucky enough to see.
content.summary: Looked like flickering candle flames.Orangish and red.Dances and flickered beautifully

content.detailedDescription:
On july 4th 09 in shillington, berks county at about 10 pm at night or about 10 minutes after the fireworks show ended, my friend pointed out a strange orange sphere shaped object in the sky about 100-120feet in the air, many people were looking at it after a minute. it was a perfect sphere, not too high up, at a constant slow-ish speed, moving from the opposite direction of the fireworks display. i fiugre it was the size of an average size excersize ball. it appeared to be full of or made fire. it wasnt the light of a plane or anything. made no noise. did not take any turns or change any speed. im not sure if it was rotating or not. at first i thought it was a firework, but it was too big to be an ember or ash, and it didnt go out.
it went in a perfectly straight line west to east ( not sure of the exact directs but it went from my left to my right)
we watched it for about 5 minutes until we were unable to see it anymore, it was too far away and behind buildings. 
i was very interested in the object and watched it the entire time i saw. my group of friends were all too much in awe to think to get out their phones and take a picture or video. im not sure if anyone else in the crowd took a video
content.summary: Saw orange sphere in air after fireworks.

content.detailedDescription:
In my driveawy, noticed unusual clouds and a lot of activity in the air.  
wish that i'd grabbed my video camera. but my still cammy(4mp olympus) caught something very unusual, which i did't see till the next day.  lights blip in and out and move, but at about 2.5 of the movie a fiery disc flashes across the right of my lens.
  video at start has a light blinking white to red in the middle of frame, and then a fiery disc with a 'tail' cuts in on the right, turns and exits right.  there is then far away movement in the upper right, then center, and upper center left of the frame and object seems to dip in, then up and out.
  i will say that i felt compelled in some way to get out and start shooting, not something i normally do.
content.summary: Fat double-row clouds, lights blink white to red, then a disc flashes across the right of frame. didn't see it till next day, suprised me.  only .3 seconds, but makes sharp turn.

content.detailedDescription:
At approximately 5:30pm (est) while driving home from work i watched two brightly lit craft flying over the washtenaw/jackson county line in a northwesterly direction.   i work in tecumseh, mi (lenawee county) and was driving home by way of manchester and napoleon, michigan.  while driving west on austin road near the county line i watched two brightly lit craft flying slowly together toward the northwest.   initially i thought that they may have been military helicopters or jets as these two craft seemed to be flying in extremely tight formation, one leading and one slightly behind.   i soon realized that they were flying much too slow to be military.   they were both lit brightly and i then realized that they were flying together, dangerously close to one another.   the sky was a dark shade of blue as the sun had set about twenty minutes previous to the sighting.   i could make out that the trailing object was probably a cessna-type craft.   i could just barely see the dark shape of the wings, fusalge with wingtip lights in their appropriate configuration.   however, the craft immediately ahead of it was unidentifiable.   it had a rather large red strobing light and a steady white light.   the strobing red light was much larger than what i've seen on other aircraft, perhaps three or four times as big.   it also seemed to be at the rear of the object.   what is most disturbing about this are that the two craft were much too close to one another for safe flying...The distance between the two was less than a hundred feet (using the size of the trailing cessna-type craft as a reference).   they maintained their distance and didn't seem to deviate, as if connected together.

the bright red strobe and two bright white lights remained visible on the horizon to the nw (flying toward jackson, mi) for several minutes after passing above and ahead of me.   it was difficult to make out any more details due to the traffic with headlights in the oncoming lane.

what still bothers me today is that these two objects were insanely close together and didn't deviate position during their flight while in my observation.   i've never seen anything like this before (including aircraft pulling gliders).   this might not be a ufo event but it certainly was an unusual display of two craft flying dangerously close to one another (and possibly illegally so).
content.summary: Two brightly lit craft, one possibly a cessna, flying together and only a few yards apart

content.detailedDescription:
My most spectacular viewing of multiple objects over the niagara falls was november 23rd at 5:55pm when they faded slowly into view.

the first time was nov 10th, second time nov 15th and this time november 23rd 2009. 

this signting lasted 4 hours this time after it faded in and out a few times, and had 1 amazing climax around 7pm with multiple objects of different shapes appearing as pictured! 

objects included the original 3 bar shaped objects, a couple triangles smaller sized, fainter bars and 1 giant either disc or triangular craft with a blueish/purple light in the center.

these objects were stationary, like rocks, hovering silently, except for when i saw the 3 pars object come down rotating slightly.

as the other times, there were 2 main amber glowing orbs and a blue flashing cylinder about 2/3 up between the 2 orbs.

this object has been the exact same shape every time.

on the 10th i saw it rise slowly over a 15 minute period, straight up and disappear, then become a dot, zip around with incredible maneuverability and then zip incredibly fast in a se direction toward buffalo. but my 23rd sighting, was too cloudy to see anything like that.

this was spectacular, a number of people and i were in contact over the phone from the casino, and a friend of mine arrived to be awe struck by the sighting.
content.summary: Third sighting, bar shaped ufo's, this time, triangles and large disc shape as well

content.detailedDescription:
I was at my brother-n-laws house in the country part by millersville collage. just short of the susquhanna river. which surrounds that era.
it was the 4th of july 1999.10:15pm after all the fire works were done i noticed what i thought at the time was a stealth fighter, and i thought damn thats pretty low coming from my 10:00 veiw. his yard was pretty large with no fenching at all conjoined to the other yards in the back of his house. i was standing in the middle of the yard alone, cant remember why since i was wit my ex wife and two sons. but they were about 40 ft in back of me has she took pictures on the cam of her family. she is not sure if she caught it on film because she thought nothing of it at the time but she might have, i have talk to her two days ago ask her to check and see. anyhow i could see it flying slowly erraticly and has it got to my 12:00 it flipped in circles 5 times and changed shapes into a triangle
green in color at times it looked like it had 3 triangle shaped wings into a complete flat triangle, the best veiw i saw was as if it was on its side and a window appeared with 3 nordic looking men in white with blonde hair staring at us as if we were mere cattle. i could see them from the belly up, not sure if they were standing or sitting. they had no apparattus on at all. i never took my eyes off it until it was gone from sight. the main light source was green which lit the craft up sorta lime green, there was a blue and white light also. i heard stories about how ufos make no noise, but this did and it was not loud but it was noticeable.The houses or ground did not shake at all. i am a army vet so i know what jets can do even a plane at 20,000 ft you hear it quite well, i have had air shows fly over and shake the house alot. even one jet. but this whizzing and whooshing sound was unique. i clocked the speed at about 45 to 50 mph. perhaps even less. most people dont get to see craft that close and distinct, i even saw the molding around the windows. i was not blinded by the lights at all, skies were clear starry and it was about 2,000 to 3,000 ft in front of me if i were to walk under it. my son ran to me across the yard and said dad! was that a ufo? and i said i don't know wtf that was but it aint ours. what gets me is everyone saw it there and there was like almost a hundred people, but young. and they were partying pretty hard and playing games so i guess to them it seemed like nothing. i talked about it for awhile with my kids and my wife but let it black out after awhile. but that image stayed with me and grew over time, and now i live in canada where its been bothering me so much and details are getting stronger, i cant get the one guy in the middle staring at me as if he could see me like a calf in the field alone. its damn near huanting. lately i have been thinking about getting hypnotised but people say it's a waste of time. i wonder. i also think about the time or if it has anything to do with the time i was working the night shift, 11:00 to 7:00 am left for work and when i approached the steel bridge as always i noticed a small white light which i thought was a reflection from the one street light and the end of the road, but it was not. it was like a probe the size of to beach balls round and all white. as it flew by my windsheild i pulled off to the side of the road but it went down into the wooded trees and so i dared not venture and headed for work. i was not going to say anything to no one, but my boss said with one of my fellow wotkers there that i was 2 hrs late. i leave everyday at the same time and im never late. but i too let this pass because this never even became a after thought because i have had no nightmares or thoughts about it. i think i would know if i was abducted. the only thing that bothers me is where did the time go and how was i late that day. its only a 20 minute drive and i left at 10:15 as always.
content.summary: Green triangle

content.detailedDescription:
Witness reported seeing a circular disk with depth and white lights hovering over a woody area on canon road in silver spring, maryland between 10 p.M. and 11 p.M. eastern time on 11/25.

event lasted three to five minutes approximately, at which point the object, which was not a helicopter or plane, moved away out of sight, toward a wooded area.
content.summary: Circular with depth and white lights

content.detailedDescription:
I live in frederick, maryland, a small city in western maryland about an hour away from both washington d.C. and baltimore.  

on the night of friday november 6th, 2009, my family and i were crossing a friends' darkened back yard on the way to our car parked in the alley behind their house.  we were on east 5th street, in downtown frederick.  i heard the sound of a "military" jet engine up in the sky.  it sounded like a single f-16.  i searched the sky for it.  i found the plane; every strobe and beacon was lit up on it.  it was chasing a pair of red-orange "dots".  the dots were not particularly very bright.  they appeared "flat".  they did not twinkle.  they remained consistent in both brightness (intensity), size and color.  one dot followed the other, horizontally.  the dots were headed in a southerly direction, the "f-16" appeared to be keeping pace, but was unable to close on the two dots.  they were just west and above of my location, (initially) about 60-70 degrees up from the horizon.  distance and altitude unknown/ unascertainable.  i watched until the view became obstructed by neighboring structures to the south-west.  the whole thing lasted about two minutes.  the skies were clear, and dark blue.  stars were visible.  i don't remember moon phase, but it may have been low, to the east.  

this area of the country has many busy air corridors, as well as many restricted air-spaces.  civilian aircraft are often escorted away from these areas by military jets.  the local ang sqaudrons fly the f-16 "viper".  

at first, i thought a civilian airplane had wandered over camp david, the presidential retreat located nearby, and had triggered a persuit.  it was when i noticed the speed at which these objects were flying that i decided this was no ordinary interception.  i've seen a pair of f-16s struggling to remain in the air as they had escorted a slow, prop driven civilian aircraft in the past.  they had to fly in large circles around the much slower offending aircraft to keep their speed up, or they will stall out of the sky.  the interceptor plane on this night was keeping up with the fast moving dots.  i don't know if the f-16 was in "burner"- i did not see a bright exhaust cone.  the rumble in the sky came from the f-16 only.  shortly after i lost view of the persuit, the chase plane must have throttled back, because the rumble dropped off dramatically.

i'm aware there may be several explanations to what i saw.  the "dots" may have been just another jet with its beacons off, etc...But.....

i want to believe!
content.summary: Two red-orange dots, medium brightness, followed by chase plane.

content.detailedDescription: At 5:50pm on saturday, november 21, 2009 in woodside, queens, nyc, i was sitting in my car at a stop light facing north at the intersection of northern blvd. and 49th st., exiting the roof parking lot of the stop & shop shopping plaza.  absentmindedly, a moving object in the low horizon of the northeast sky caught my attention.  i initially assumed it was another plane leaving laguardia airport but it seemed a bit larger than typical planes.  it was moving at normal speed but i was shocked to see it had a tail of blue/orange fire - making it seem like a horizontal tear drop.  my stomach dropped and my gut reaction was: oh no - that's a plane on fire!  i followed its path for the next 5-6 seconds until it was due north of my position and it simply vanished!  i was stunned and looked around to see if anyone else had seen it - pedestrians or people in cars.  no one seemed to have seen it.  i immediately wondered if i had seen a meteor or something.  i checked the news (online/print) over the next few days but could not find any mention of the sighting.  just thought i would post it here, as i hope to find a possible explanation.  i definitely saw something!
content.summary: Low-flying object with blue/orange-like tail of fire moved east-to-west for 10 seconds then simply vanished

content.detailedDescription:
It was a summer night, clear sky, we were two couples in a truck, i was behind the driver looking through the window when i saw the ufo in 10 to 10 position moving slowly between 100 or 150 feet high. i told my friend and we passed by the path of the ufo and stop in the middle of the road. the ufo was at that time in 8 o'clock position and was descending and approaching very slow to our location. it was huge and sound less, i could see an entity
in the lower level, in the middle level lights were spinning with different colors, when the ufo was getting closer a yellow light was lighting the area, it was kind of cloudy yellow. we were observing the ufo until it stop
above our head no more than 30 feet high. next thing i remember was me getting up in a sort of spiral steps escorting by an alien behind me i think to the 2nd level. an alien almost 7 ft tall with blond hair and a colorful tight uniform was standing up just in front of me on my right side when i reached the floor level,his head was kind of upside down conical shape , , he looked and me with a friendly attitude for a moment and then he kept doing whatever he was doing. i saw another entity far away on my left side also engaged in other activity. the room was wide and spacious kind of self illuminated, the ceiling had a dome shape and the color was a intense blue similar to the sky you can see in the early morning high in the mountains. the one who was escorting me took me across the room and introduced me to a fourth alien was sitting down and greeted me with a friendly approach, i remember no have a single drop of fear. he talked to me for a while i could feel how we were moving i do not know if we were flying or just floating. after that point i can not remember anything else.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Round, 3 levels, 200/300 feet diameter.

content.detailedDescription:
Submitted again because rich sander of mufon never investigated!
they never 'stabilized' the video, they never analyzed the video! i had to do that! 
  updates: 
  -stabilized video which mufon wasn't able to do
  -isolated still shots (mufon again was unable to do this.. didn't have the right "software" or equipment! shows how scientific their "research" really is) 
  -traced outlines where you can clearly see five-points.. bright red strobing lights, and no blades or propellors!
  -made a narration video where you can see surrounding areas and drawling rendition of craft 


nov. 12th, 2009 - original mufon case #20533  
i was on rt. 30 west going into greensburg, and while waiting at the intersection by mountain view inn, i noticed what appeared to be two birds "fighting" each other, or in some kind of squabble, over the highway up ahead.  as i drove closer, red blinking lights drew my attention upwards to these "birds", which were spinning, rotating, and circling each other.
  i then drove directly under the objects, and i clearly see that the craft was a five-pointed star-shape when viewed from underneath. circular-ringed ridges were on the body, emanating from a center dome in the middlr of the craft outward.   my very first reaction seeing this was that these were some sort of r.C. airplane, but then it dawned on me that these had flown extremely low in comparison with the tops of nearby trees.
  i pulled over in the middle of the road next to the dividing barrier, and tried to film what i could as they flew away. trees and powerlines are somewhat in the way in the film.  1 minute and 30 seconds of film shot, with only about 15 seconds of "good" footage of the crafts.
the "backs" of these crafts had a giant red light fixture, approx. 3 ft in heighth and 6 ft in length, with vertical rows of lights that would flash from side-to-side. 
  as it flew away, the two crafts appeared to fly slightly unstable, wobbling and tilting side-to-side as it flew off.
  it headed off first south, but then veered in a south-westernly direction, and i attempted to chase it by following road in that general direction, but i never was able to catch another glimpse of them.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Two seperate "star-shaped" objects fly across rt. 30 in broad daylight!

content.detailedDescription:
Sister called saying she was seeing a strange flashing object in telescope that looked cigar shaped.  i went outside and asked her what direction in the sky, close to what star grouping. as i turned to face east, what looked and moved like a shooting star, but from bottom to top appeared and then disappeared. then suddenly i seen what my sister had been seeing. it flashed red like, then orange and was moving in angles, changing directions, at tremendous speed. after a few minutes, it slowed down to a pace, as if to appear just a plane in the sky. at this point, i knew better. at least not like any plane i'd ever seen. it moved southernly towards waco direction. i watched til i could not see it anymore. 

it appeared to have been possibly over lake whitney area, which is east from my home. government ufo? or other origin?
content.summary: Fast moving object flashing red to orange colors

content.detailedDescription: Witnessed by my wife also while standing on our deck - looking at the beautiful clear sky noticed the two objects because of their brightness - my wife got the binocculars just inside the door - could not see any shape just two very bright lights with no strobes at all - there was a jet traveling in the same direction behind the two lights at just less than their speed - also another jet in front of them traveling in straight toward them.  i am a pilot and i know these two aircraft had to see the lights - as they reached the eastern sky the white light turned to orange and just disappeared while still in the air - they did not fall over the horizon - this transformation of light took maybe 15 seconds and they were gone.  these were not aircraft - they disappeared.
content.summary: Two white starlike objects above 20k ft one following the other as if in formation - traveling nnw to e - speed 600knots plus - changed color from white to orange in east and disappered
